channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Extended Search
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Extended Search

item.title: CVE-2022-4649|2024-08-03T01:48:39.617Z -- unknown -- wp%20extended%20search
item.description: The WP Extended Search WordPress plugin before 2.1.2 does not validate and escape one of its shortcode attributes, which could allow users with a role as low as contributor to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attack.
